2025-09-19T23:35:00.CONTENT_EN: Due to high wind , the following special traffic and transport arrangements have been implemented on Hong Kong-Zhuhai-Macao Bridge Hong Kong Link Road (HZMB HKLR), with details as shown below: The speed limit of the HZMB HKLR is lowered from 100 km/h to 50 km/h.
2025-09-19T23:35:00.CONTENT_CN: 由於強風，港珠澳大橋香港連接路已實施以下特別交通及運輸安排： 港珠澳大橋香港連接路的最高車速限制由每小時100 公里降低至每小時50 公里。

2025-09-20T01:00:00.CONTENT_EN: Due to improved weather condition, the following arrangements have been implemented on Hong Kong-Zhuhai-Macao Bridge Hong Kong Link Road (HZMB HKLR): The speed limit of the HZMB HKLR resumes to 100 km/h.
2025-09-20T01:00:00.CONTENT_CN: 因天氣情況改善，港珠澳大橋香港連接路已實施以下安排： 港珠澳大橋香港連接路最高車速限制恢復為每小時100 公里。

description.INCIDENT_DETAIL_EN: MTR Train Service Arrangement (Quarry Bay Station)
description.INCIDENT_DETAIL_CN: 港鐵服務安排(鰂魚涌站)

2025-09-20T05:57:00.CONTENT_EN:
Transport Department has received notification from MTR Corporation Limited that according to the latest assessment, train service for Tseung Kwan O Line and Island Line remain normal today (20 Sep). The train frequency of Island Line will be enhanced during the morning peak hours. 
Entrances/Exits A and B of Quarry Bay Station are temporarily closed because of police action near the station. Please use Entrance/ Exit C.
2025-09-20T05:57:00.CONTENT_CN:
運輸署接獲港鐵公司通知，根據最新評估，將軍澳綫及港島綫今天(9月20日)維持正常服務。港島綫列車服務會於早上繁忙時間加強。
為配合警方於站外的行動，鰂魚涌站A及B出入口暫時關閉，請使用C出入口。

2025-09-20T12:18:00.CONTENT_EN:
Transport Department has received notification from MTR Corporation Limited that according to the latest assessment, train service for Tseung Kwan O Line and Island Line remain normal today (20 Sep). 
Entrances/Exits A and B of Quarry Bay Station are temporarily closed because of police action near the station. Please use Entrance/ Exit C.
2025-09-20T12:18:00.CONTENT_CN:
運輸署接獲港鐵公司通知，根據最新評估，將軍澳綫及港島綫今天(9月20日)維持正常服務。
為配合警方於站外的行動，鰂魚涌站A及B出入口暫時關閉，請使用C出入口。

2025-09-20T13:18:00.CONTENT_EN: Transport Department has received notification from MTR Corporation Limited that the Entrances/Exits A and B of Quarry Bay Station closed earlier have resumed normal.
2025-09-20T13:18:00.CONTENT_CN: 運輸署接獲港鐵公司通知，早前關閉的鰂魚涌站A及B出入口已重新開放。

2025-09-20T07:37:00.CONTENT_EN: Amber Rainstorm Warning Signal is in force. Due to wet weather and slippery roads, Transport Department appeals motorists and the commuters to: i. plan the journey in advance; ii. allow more traveling time; iii. drive with extra care and patience; and iv. take heed of traffic situation particularly at busy junctions with obstructive views.
2025-09-20T07:37:00.CONTENT_CN: 黃色暴雨警告信號現已生效，天雨路滑，運輸署呼籲駕駛人士及乘客須: i.提早計劃行程路線； ii.預留充裕時間出門； iii.小心駕駛及保持忍讓；及 iv.留意交通情況，特别在視線受阻的繁忙路口。

2025-09-21T09:10:00.CONTENT_EN: Amber Rainstorm Warning Signal is in force. Due to wet weather and slippery roads, Transport Department appeals motorists and the commuters to: i. plan the journey in advance; ii. allow more traveling time; iii. drive with extra care and patience; and iv. take heed of traffic situation particularly at busy junctions with obstructive views.
2025-09-21T09:10:00.CONTENT_CN: 黃色暴雨警告信號現已生效，天雨路滑，運輸署呼籲駕駛人士及乘客須: i.提早計劃行程路線； ii.預留充裕時間出門； iii.小心駕駛及保持忍讓；及 iv.留意交通情況，特别在視線受阻的繁忙路口。

2025-09-21T09:53:00.CONTENT_EN: Tsui Wah Ferry Service (H. K. ) Limited Due to mechanical failure, the kaito ferry service of Sai Kung to Kau Sai Village & High Island will be delayed. The actual departure time will be announced later.
2025-09-21T09:53:00.CONTENT_CN: 翠華船務（香港）有限公司 因機件故障，西貢至滘西村及糧船灣的街渡服務開出時間將會延誤，實際開出時間將會再作通知。

2025-09-21T10:08:00.CONTENT_EN: Tsui Wah Ferry Service (H. K. ) Limited The kaito ferry service of Sai Kung to Kau Sai Village & High Island which was delayed due to mechanical failure has been resumed.
2025-09-21T10:08:00.CONTENT_CN: 翠華船務（香港）有限公司 較早前因機件故障而延誤的西貢至滘西村及糧船灣的街渡服務現已恢復服務。

2025-09-22T17:47:03.CONTENT_EN:
Transport Department announces at 5:45 pm that due to strong wind condition, the following special traffic arrangement will be implemented on Hong Kong Zhuhai-Macao-Bridge Hong Kong Link Road (HZMB HKLR):

Traffic Arrangement
The HZMB HKLR will be closed at 03:00 pm on 23 September 2025, and all vehicles will be prohibited to enter. 


Transport Department Advice
- Drivers are requested to drive with care and pay attention to the direction of the Police or the Management, Operation and Maintenance (MOM) Contractor of HyD. 
- Members of the public are advised to pay attention to radio / TV announcements and TD’s App e-Mobility for the latest traffic condition.
2025-09-22T17:47:03.CONTENT_CN:
:因強風關係，港珠澳大橋香港連接路將實施下列特別交通安排:

交通安排
港珠澳大橋香港連接路將會於二零二五年九月二十三日下午3 時00 分起封閉，及禁止車輛使用。


運輸署公告
-駕駛人士請盡量忍讓及留意警務人員或路政署的服務承辦商指示。
-公眾人士請留意電視/電台交通消息廣播及運輸署流動應用程式「香港出行易」有關最新交通消息。

2025-09-22T19:32:00.CONTENT_EN: As informed by Mainland Railway Authorities, High Speed Rail train service between Hong Kong and the Mainland after 18:00 on 23 Sep 2025 and on 24 Sep 2025 have been cancelled due to expected adverse weather conditions. For ticket refunds, please refer to the High Speed Rail website and process within the time stated. Please use the 12306 official website (12306. cn) or mobile app and there is no need to rush to Hong Kong West Kowloon Station.
2025-09-22T19:32:00.CONTENT_CN: 內地鐵路單位通報，由於預期天氣情況惡劣，2025年9月23日由18:00之後及2025年9月24日所有來往香港及內地的高速鐵路列車班次取消。 如需退票，請參閱高速鐵路網頁並於指定日期內辦理。請盡量使用12306官方網站(12306.cn)或手機應用程式，不用急於到香港西九龍站辦理。

description.INCIDENT_DETAIL_EN: Some train trips have been cancelled before 18:00 on 23 Aug 2025
description.INCIDENT_DETAIL_CN: 2025年09月23日18:00前部分列車班次取消

2025-09-22T19:55:00.CONTENT_EN: As informed by Mainland Railway Authorities, the following High Speed Rail train trips before 18:00 on 23 Aug 2025 have been cancelled due to expected adverse weather conditions: From Hong Kong West Kowloon Station: G6392, G5614, G6542, G6048, G5618, G6550, G5658, G6560, G6564, G6562, G5608, G3008, G6578 To Hong Kong West Kowloon Station: G6523, G6391, G6541, G5617, G6047, G6549, G6569, G6557, G6561, G6559, G6563, G3007, G6573, G6577 Destination Changed: G6570, G6548, G6558, G6574 (Arrive at Shenzhenbei Station) For latest train schedules, please refer to 12306 official website (12306. cn) or click the “Chēzhàn dà píng” (only available on Chinese version) on the mobile app. Citizens may also check latest train information from the HSR website, mobile app or the information available at Hong Kong West Kowloon Station. For ticket refunds, please refer to the High Speed Rail website and process within the time stated. Please use the 12306 official website (12306. cn) or mobile app and there is no need to rush to Hong Kong West Kowloon Station.
2025-09-22T19:55:00.CONTENT_CN: 內地鐵路單位通報，由於預期天氣情況惡劣，2025年09月23日18:00前下列高速鐵路列車車次取消： 由香港西九龍站出發： G6392,G5614,G6542,G6048,G5618,G6550,G5658,G6560,G6564,G6562,G5608,G3008,G6578 前往香港西九站站： G6523,G6391,G6541,G5617,G6047,G6549,G6569,G6557,G6561,G6559,G6563,G3007,G6573,G6577 更改終到站的車次： G6570,G6548,G6558,G6574 (終到站更改為深圳北) 有關車次的資料，請留意12306官方網站(12306.cn)，如已安裝手機應用程式，可按「車站大屏」頁面。市民亦可留意於高速鐵路網頁、手機應用程式或香港西九龍站發放的最新資訊。 如需退票，請參閱高速鐵路網頁並於指定日期內辦理。請盡量使用12306官方網站(12306.cn)或手機應用程式，不用急於到香港西九龍站辦理。
